text: Can you rewrite this so it sounds more casual and internet-native? I missed the deadline but I’m still interested.
Please rewrite this to be polite and professional: I won’t be able to attend the meeting due to a conflict.
Rewrite this to be concise for a Slack message: The deployment failed and we need to roll back ASAP.
Make this sound friendly for a group chat: I’m running 10 minutes late, start without me.
Rewrite this for a formal email tone: Thank you for your feedback. I will incorporate the changes today.
Rewrite this as a short, polite message to a landlord: The heater isn’t working since yesterday.
Rewrite to be warm but not too formal: Sorry for the late reply—I’ve been swamped this week.
Rewrite for a customer support chat: My order arrived damaged. I’d like a replacement.
Rewrite as a polite LinkedIn message: I enjoyed your talk and would love to connect.
Rewrite for a casual DM: Wanna grab coffee sometime this week?
Rewrite to be professional: I’m following up on the invoice sent last week.
Rewrite for a complaint but stay respectful: The service was slow and my booking was ignored.
Rewrite to be polite and clear for a work chat: Could you share the latest version of the deck?
Rewrite to be friendly for classmates: Anyone wants to form a study group for the exam?
Rewrite as concise app review: The app crashes every time I open settings.
Rewrite for a casual WeChat-style message: 我刚到啦，你在哪儿？
Rewrite for a polite work message in Chinese: 麻烦您确认一下明天的会议时间是否还是3点？
Rewrite for customer service tone in Chinese: 你好，我的包裹显示已签收但我没收到。
Rewrite for a casual message in Japanese: ごめん、ちょっと遅れる！先に始めてて。
Rewrite for a polite business email in Japanese: お忙しいところ恐れ入りますが、ご確認をお願いいたします。
Rewrite for customer support in Japanese: 注文した商品が不良品でした。交換できますか。
Rewrite for a casual message in Korean: 나 지금 출발했어. 10분 뒤에 도착할 듯!
Rewrite for a professional tone in Korean: 회의록을 정리해서 공유드리겠습니다.
Rewrite for customer complaint in Korean but stay polite: 배송이 예정일보다 이틀 늦었습니다.
Rewrite for a casual message in French: Je suis en retard de 5 minutes, j’arrive.
Rewrite for a formal French email: Je vous remercie pour votre retour et reste à disposition.
Rewrite for customer support in French: Mon abonnement a été débité deux fois ce mois-ci.
Rewrite for a casual message in German: Bin gleich da, dauert nur noch 10 Minuten.
Rewrite for a professional German email: Könnten Sie bitte die aktualisierte Datei senden?
Rewrite for German customer support: Das Produkt entspricht nicht der Beschreibung. Ich möchte es zurückgeben.
